text: Vishwanath Pratap Singh (25 June 1931 â€“ 27 November 2008), was an Indian politician. He was the 8th Prime Minister of India from 1989 to 1990. He was born in Allahabad, United Provinces, British India. Singh died of multiple myeloma in New Delhi on 27 November 2008 at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Politicians from Uttar Pradesh Category:Prime Ministers of India
title: Vishwanath Pratap Singh
